website_summaries.verdict: The advantage of this seat is in the ability to manage the levels of heat with 4 settings.
pros: Low heat is very close to body temperature
cons: Heat is sometimes not even across the whole seat

customer_reviews.title: My LumaWarm seat is LumaHot
customer_reviews.text: My LumaWarm seat is LumaHot. I gave it a while to break in and the low setting was still 98 – 100 degrees. That is not warm and I sweat on it. I would think that the warm or LOW setting would be about 85 degrees and go up from there to 100 degrees max. I do wish that the lid was a little sturdier to sit on but all in all, the seat is well constructed and met expectations except for the temp levels. I did contact them and was told that there was no way to soften the settings with a resistor or replacement heating element. I really wanted to keep it but hot is not warm.
customer_reviews.author: zeeder

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so first, oh my god this is like sitting on a little warm cloud! To those of you who are wondering if it gets hot enough, yes it does! Granted, our house is set at 71 so it's not exactly frigid, but I'm a wimp (aren't we all-we're buying a heated toilet seat after all) and I still turned it down to medium heat. Second, I don't think I'll end up using the light, but it's included so whatever. I've wanted one of these for years (always seemed too ridiculous to spend $100 on a toilet seat) and it's everything I hoped and dreamed it would be!!! Glad my husband gave me my Christmas present early!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: corroded after three years
customer_reviews.text: We bought this model about 3 years ago. It started to work intermittently recently so I opened up the electronics compartment and discovered that the circuit board components and wiring were badly corroded, apparently just from the toilet water humidity. But, its much less expensive than other models. I bought another one and will spray the electronics with waterproofing spray this time.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: $10 to return via UPS if the item does not work for any reason
customer_reviews.text: Ok, got the item, albeit it did not work for ya due to electrical outlet being too far to install. So needed to return. Most Amazon-sold products would allow for UPS drop off or pickup, free of charge, but this vendor is making us Oy $9.95 to return a product that was not fit at all. So once you have bought it and it does not work for any reason, it will cost you $$ to return!
customer_reviews.author: Areg Alimian

customer_reviews.title: Not heating up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter. I had high hopes for it. The seat is barely warm and that's on the highest setting possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: I installed this March 2018, and it started acting up within a month. I was going to return it in April, but then it would work again. It continued to act like a moody 12-year-old until November, when it quit heating entirely. I’m so disappointed in this! I bought as a gift to myself, and I wish I’d bought a different brand. Don’t waste your money. The heating element doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased 1 at first, no one wanted to use the other toilets in the house after one use. I purchased two additional seats. It really makes the middle of the night Mother Nature calls a little nicer, no cold seat to startle you awake. But remember if you’re homes power fails, Don’t Forget to turn the seat ON again. They don’t automatically resume the On position. I have given 2 as gifts to family.
customer_reviews.author: W. Faith

customer_reviews.title: Warm your buns
customer_reviews.text: I love this product BUT, their engineering really SUCKS. The spacing for the attachment bolts did not fit my high-quality toilet. Installing it in my RV space really put my patience to the test. That's the bad. The good is it seems to be well built. I like the blue night light. We use the heat on low and it works very well. Nice and warm. Great since we sleep in a cool environment.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Failed right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Medium heat setting did not work right out of the box, the LED indicator light for the medium heat setting would only come on sometimes but it never heated up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a heated toilet seat that failed for my wife's bathroom. She loves it. It's warm when she needs it (especially in those middle of the night visits!). The only area of improvement I would suggest is some type of thermo control - it stays warm even when the bathroom is hot (during warm weather). Her old one was temperature sensitive and would only provide a heated seat when the room temperature was cool. It could also use a 'stay on' feature. After a power failure, it has to be turned back on - something she didn't realize until she sat on it to find it cold, cold, cold!
customer_reviews.author: Hacker15

customer_reviews.title: Warranty satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 toilet seats in the past and have always been happy with them. Unfortunately, the last one I purchased was September 22, 2018. It is only four months old and has burned out and will not heat at any levels. I thought that they have a one year warranty and am hoping Brondell stands behind their products. Please advise as to what further actions I must pursue.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hubers

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bidet which makes toilet seat warm. I wanted to have a warm toilet seat for the ground level restroom but did not want to have bidet for the toilet which can be used by guests. I was happy to see this item and ordered immediately. It has been two months and it has been great. I do not have to prepare myself before seating on a cold toilet. The seat cover also closes slowly and smoothly, which is nice bonus. And it also has night light which is quite good to look at. I think, this can be a very nice gift for old parents. I am pretty sure they will appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: L.O.V.E.  LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Sat on a heated toilet seat for the first time during a visit to Japan in November 2018. Knew that I had to get one asap when I returned to the states. Had to add an outlet by the toilet first but once that was done it was just a matter of finding a good seat for a great price. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED! This seat is awesome. And the light for the toilet bowl is the cherry on top. Side note: Don't be surprised if friends want to use their phones to take pictures / record videos of the lighted toilet bowl. Wouldn't have thought that would 'wow' people but it sure does. It's pretty funny actually.
customer_reviews.author: myopinion

customer_reviews.title: STOPED WORKING IN 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Seat stop working after 2 months. The support number they give you on Amazon does not work. I would not recommend. Best to spend more money on a quality product. No service at all to return or get any questions answered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat. Only wish it would mount to toilet more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace 1 that broke. I bought and installed original a little over 2 1/2 years ago. All of a sudden toilet seat started getting really hot and no buttons worked light wouldn't go on or off and couldn't adjust heat setting. Unplugged and plugged back in only worked for 1 day then completely stopped. Seat slides around a little even after tightening bolts as tight as possible. Would like if they changed mounting bolts to a different style current style won't allow seat to stay sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whisler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 2nd time we've ordered this product, and the 3rd time that we have purchased a Brondell product. All have have been excellent. This newest purchase was installed in our new motorhome. It's one of those creature comforts that my wife, in particular, really loves when we're "roughing it," and I'm very appreciative of it when we're out in cold weather. Also, the blue night light is absolutely fantastic when making (or staggering!) to the bathroom in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Stan L. Riggin

customer_reviews.title: Brondell: Can a toilet seat be luxurious, attractive, functional, sturdy and inexpensive??
customer_reviews.text: You bet! Brondell's LumaWarm heated nightlight toilet seat is all that and more ... and it's made in the USA!!! Ever since I first experienced a heated seat at the historic 5-star Halekulani Hotel in beautiful Waikiki last spring, I've been thinking about making this simple addition at home that promises so much simple pleasure. It gets cold here in the winter and stumbling in to the bathroom at Zero-Dark:30 to sit in utter blackness on a freezing ice-fishing hole is NOT at all what's wanted! Feel like pampered royalty all year round with Brondell's LumaWarm heated nightlight toilet seat. You'll thank me, and Brondell, early and often.
customer_reviews.author: Maleko

customer_reviews.title: Works a Treat!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, you guys! My bathroom has no heat and boy, is that toilet seat cold in the winter! This is much cheaper than getting central heat to this room. I set it up yesterday. If my outlet were closer to the toilet, this would have been really easy. However, it took some time to set up cable concealers and run the extension cord through it. I have the heat set on low, and it’s plenty warm. My bum is thrilled. I also have a Tushy bidet attachment, and this works with it, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E. Habecker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: First the light went out, then the heating element. It's difficult to clean as well, not well thought out with the crevices. For a $100+ toilet seat this was not worth it all, pretty disappointed. The soft close feature did hold well over the years, but you are paying for the heat and the light, which in my case didn't last...
customer_reviews.author: captmarc

customer_reviews.title: WOMEN LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: IF you want to make the women in your life happy, buy them a heated toilet seat. Trust me, you'll be a hero, not only to them, but to all their friends, and their friend's friends, etc. ad-infinitum. The down side is that all your male friends will hate you because their ladies will forever be comparing them to you...you who loved your lady enough to install a power outlet and give her a heated toilet seat...yes, you will be both loved and hated, but guys get over it much faster, and women will smile at least 3 times a day when they sit on the heated toilet seat you so lovingly provided for them. ...ya, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: the starfish

customer_reviews.title: Wow - Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when my spouse asked me to purchased the heated seat for her. I thought that it was a ridiculous request. I received it, installed it and turned it on. She loved it and I was happy for her. Okay, so I used it (this was during winter.) OMG! What a purchase! Sitting on a nice, warm seat during winter was a blissful experience. I admitted to her that it was a good idea and she hasn't let me forget it since. Note, I don't recommend using it during summer, unless you keep your house very cold.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kanode

customer_reviews.title: Quite warm. No energy saving mode, Light is great! Cord is short.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced bide seat that we weren't really using except for the heated mode. This is more compact, but it does eat into your sitting area a bit in the back. It's quite warm, so we only need it on the low setting. The bide has energy saving mode, where it would quickly warm when it detected skin. This one is always going. No idea how much power it uses. Never checked. The light is fantastic at night, even with the lid down. I'd prefer the cord be a bit longer. I bought two of these and will have to take one apart to replace the cord with a longer one, so it's not heated right now. LOVE heated seat!
customer_reviews.author: T. Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Slow close fails in less then a year
customer_reviews.text: I have now had two of these seats, each the slow close stopped holding the seat upright after around 9 months. Both new out of the box would only hold the lower seat at about 90% up but it would always stay once lifted. after around 9 months you will need to start holding the lower seat for a couple seconds to get it to stay up or it will drop back down. My first seat was replaced under factory warranty but they stated it is a one time replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the LumaWarm commode seat and it fit perfectly. it was very easy to install and I had plenty of electrical cord to plug into the receptacle. I purchased this for my mother and she is really enjoying the warm commode seat. She uses the very lowest warming setting and says it is just right. She also likes the soft blue LED night light. The lid and the seat drop slowly so there won't be any loud noise at night if you accidentally dropped them while shutting them. This is a very good product and good quality. I would suggest this item to anyone that wants a warm commode seat. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Stephens

customer_reviews.title: In a cold room, this is LUXURY
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME!! I only have it on “low”. My house isn’t THAT cold. However, if it’s going into an outdoor outhouse, “medium or high would likely be good. This draws about 40 watts. The draw is independent of the heat setting. When on high, it stays on for much longer. On low, it switches on and off quite a bit to keep the heat low. (Just like an electric blanket does). It doesn’t cost much to keep on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: S Kett

customer_reviews.title: My Standard of Living Just Went Up
customer_reviews.text: I used to screech each time I sat on our cold toilet seat. Now, I do nothing but smile. This toilet seat is just great. The three settings are great - we choose medium but it's nice to have a choice. Easy to install after you read the good directions. My research suggests this is the best seat of its kind for quality and value. So far, that appears right!
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous indulgence during a cold winter.
customer_reviews.text: We have had two of the Ultratouch heated seats and they were okay while they worked. Both died early and both had a somewhat odd feeling to the plastic. So we upped what we were willing to pay and are so glad we did. The Brondell seat is in an entirely different class from the Ultratouch. The soft close feature is a nice addition, but the seat itself is just so much better quality. My only regret is that we waited to purchase it and used the others first.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Wishard

customer_reviews.title: Wow that's toasty!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my cart's save for later for a year before I finally broke down and purchased it. Now I'm completely spoiled and so is my husband. It's also lead to so strange conversations with house guests. Overall it's been fantastic. If you don't like the shock of a cold seat you will love this. I must warn you though. You will hate having to go on any other toilet when you are not home!
customer_reviews.author: JenLivingLife

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product - easy to install, works fine so far and is attractive. What I didn't realize is that not all round toilet bowls are the same size. As you can see from the photo, there is about 7/8" bowl overhang. I contacted Brondell customer support who was empathetic, but there is really no solution other than changing out the toilet - which I am not about to do. I do have a non-electric washlet under the seat, but it does not affect the length. I cannot state with certainty that any other brands would be a better match. However, I can live with this issue as appearance is not greatly compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Rose46

customer_reviews.title: Our House Guests Like It So Much,
customer_reviews.text: we've had several ask for the specifics so they could buy their own (it's in a guest bathroom). Warm hams beat cold hams on frigid nights. It's been servicing fannies for a year without a problem. No butts about it. Easy to install, easy to clean, and works (more than I can say for the Carrier WiFi thermostat). We're about to buy a second one for another bathroom. That's as good an endorsement as you can give.
customer_reviews.author: Parsifal

customer_reviews.title: Decadence, newly defined...
customer_reviews.text: Granted, it doesn't often get really cold here in Central Texas compared to places 'way North, but since our master bath W.C. is on a North wall & has a window, the room itself gets pretty cold sometimes. Had it for less than a week and one relatively cold snap, but the warm seat is really welcome sensation still prompts a flashback & a smile of winter days taking a contrasting frigid seat in the outhouse behind our family "camphouse" in the woods. Wish we'd bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysBusy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Toilet Seat on the Planet!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat for my wife for Christmas. We have been together for 22 years and she said this is the Best gift she ever got!! This is a Great product, easy to install and I’m no handyman and within 5 mins I was sitting and enjoying the warmth. The cord is long enough but does come out on the left side looking at the toilet seat which was perfect for my area. A++++ all around will order more to give them as gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Warm seat
customer_reviews.text: The installation of this seat, although a different style from most, was very simply and easily adjustable to fit pretty much any toilet bowl. Sure makes a nice difference. Installed on a downstairs, basement toilet that is along an outside wall in a Wisconsin home. Did not like using this toilet in the winter, like an ice cube. So nice and compfy warm now, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: FER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this earlier in the year and it's been working perfectly ever since. We loooove it and haven't turned it off since we got it! Now we're spoiled and hate sitting on a cold toilet seat lol! The only thing that might not work for some people, is that your outlet has to be fairly close to the toilet. We'll soon be installing outlets next to our other two toilets so that we can have one of these in every bathroom. It was easy to install and is such a nice luxury...I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This produce is outstanding. The heat setting I use is low whic, depending on how cold the room is, is usually good. You may only use the high setting if this was in an outdoor setting. The product used 50 watts (this is independent of temp setting. On ‘low’ it just cycles on and off more than on high) . It’s very inexpensive to run. It’s a luxury most people don’t talk about but it is worth every penny in the winter!!
customer_reviews.author: S Kett

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of these!
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute delight to sit on a warm toilet seat during the winter/colder months. On the lowest setting this seat is perfect for me as we have a reasonably comfortable bath already. Installation is simple for most anyone as long as you have an outlet nearby. But, of course, few of us have that. In my case there was power nearby I could tap into and add a GFCI outlet near the toilet. This only took me about 2 hours. This is my second lumiwarm. You will love this.
customer_reviews.author: WileyK

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: Perfect score for both installation and functionality. Only limiting factor is what I felt was the need to install an electrical plug below the sink next to toilet and the need to drill hole on the side of the cabinet supporting the sink next to toilet. That took the time. All things considered the effort to do this worth while and the product a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Ansorge

customer_reviews.title: Heated and Lighted Toilet Seat!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering a Brondell 1400 Bidet toilet seat late last year ordering this heated and lighted toilet seat was a no brainer. Of course it is for another toilet in our house. The LED blue light really makes a difference to see where you are no matter if lights or on or not. When it is chilly outside it is a pleasure to have a warm or hot place to rest, etc.
customer_reviews.author: acturage

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly but wish you could sit on the lid
customer_reviews.text: don't know why they make toilet seats with flimsy lids, I hate that. Other than that this unit rocks. You do have to install you own electrical outlet. This heated seat is heaven. I keep it on low in the summer and medium in the winter. Can't imagine anyone using the high setting. If the power goes out you will need to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: comfy, cozy, heated seat
customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids (and I) think this is one of the greatest inventions! It's especially appreciated in the far end of the house, furthest from the furnace where the toilet seat is otherwise pretty chilly. The only problem we have (not so much of a problem) is what temp to set it to. This is our second Brondell headed seat now, so we have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dan O

customer_reviews.title: For the cold winter mornings
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This works. It's already made some December mornings a lot nicer. The light turns off, I bet some people like the light. I don't care. What once was cold has been made un-cold. Seems sturdy enough other than the lid, which closes silently. Cons: The lid does not seem heavy duty, but I don't think I sit on the closed lid, anyhow. If you do, be aware, not so thick.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic buy its a must have
customer_reviews.text: i love it. its one of those things you dident know you needed until you sit on it. my only complaints are the seat does stay up. the lid stays up just not the seat. and also the two peices that hold the seat to the toilet dont lock in. thats really the only problem with it. other than that i don't know how I ever lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Durability issue
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd seat. The first one lasted almost 5 years before the construction of the unit 'collapsed'. It seemed to 'smash' into itself .. I was afraid of getting burned, or worse, starting a fire. I purschased my 2nd one in July of 2019. One year later ... same issue...it 'collapsed' onto itself. I'm not a big guy .. only weigh around 190 lbs. I wish these units were more durable ... the heating system itself was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: BruToU

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be able to live without it
customer_reviews.text: Stumbled on this product while looking for a Christmas gift to get my husband. Our bathroom is extremely cold at night during the winter so a heated toilet seat sounded nice. At first it was silly but as soon as we installed it and tried it out we never knew what we were missing. This is the best little luxury you could ever have in your home. Guests absolutely love it and everyone wants one after trying it out. We have had our first one now for 4 years, and purchased another one for a second bathroom a couple years later. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: great luxury item
customer_reviews.text: I debated for a while as to whether I should splurge and buy this or not. I wish I would have done it sooner. Very easy to install, nice quality item. the low heat setting is more than adequate for me. But be prepared - if you buy this, your friends will laugh at you. It's worth it though. I put my meter on it, and it uses 1/4 kwh per day - literally operating for pennies a month. If you want a little bit of luxury, don't hesitate, you will love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fleming

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works perfectly whether the lid is up or down!!!!! Nice nightlight. Perfect for those cold winter days. Liked it so much I just ordered another one for the guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: I like a little heat in my seat.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed getting this and finding the quality is excellent. Installs tight to the bowl and tightens well. Very adjustable which I appreciate too. Only "wish" is if the cord were able to plug into either side. But it is plenty long, more than 2 feet. Both the bottom and top soft close. It is comfortable and the low setting is plenty warm.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer sinceinception

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sturdy-live it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this heated seat. It’s sleek and sturdy and I would buy it again if I had more bathrooms. I have a Toto Washlet in my master bath and have another Toto for the guest bathroom but needed a plumber so bought this until I get a plumber. I like this one so much I’m not going to switch it out!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Queen of the throne
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been wanting one of these for years, ever since she had sat on one while in a hotel. Since we don't have an electrical outlet behind our toilet and I didn't want to run an extension cord, which is not a good idea anyway, I had to run some wire up from the basement and install a GFI outlet just below the tank to keep it out of sight. She's extremely happy with it, which makes ME happy. I had been putting this off because of the outlet issue, but it didn't take as long as I thought it would. Now she brings her ipad with her when using it. Next project; installing an ipad holder/charger. Yay...
customer_reviews.author: G.Warren

customer_reviews.title: A NECCESITY, NOT A LUXURY
customer_reviews.text: A week ago it was a real shock when for the first time in 5 years my toilet seat was cold. The subzero outdoor temperature probably magnified the shock. This is a replacement and the only reason I rate 4 stars instead of 5 is the predecessor failed after 5 years. The seat is easy to install and keep clean. I thought it was a luxurious joke when my daughter gave me the first one. Now i consider it a necessity, not a luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Hope you love it as much as i do
customer_reviews.text: A stone cold toilet seat, that will wake you up better than coffee. All I need is a warm seat. I purchased this for my guest bathroom. Took me no more than 10 mins to install. Love it so far. FYI-the cord is rather short, but I do have an outlet on the side of the toilet, so it’s not an issue for me. Warm butt for everyone from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tc8888

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to have a heated toilet. I would never go back. I bought a second one (from a non-Amazon source) after liking this one so much. One thing, though, it seems that the two different Brondell seats run a little different in terms of heat. I suppose there is some variation by chance, or I don't know if it would somehow be different based on how it rests on a toilet(?) The one I got from the other source seems a little warmer at the highest setting. That one is glorious. I'd even like it more if it were 5 degrees higher.
customer_reviews.author: K. Minik

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic in every way!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, very easy to install, then just plug in. We do keep our home chilly at night and getting the Brondell LumaWarm has made what was similar to the chill of using an outhouse into a very pleasant experience, like being in a really fancy hotel. On the lowest level, it provides the right degree of heat. The seat is comfy, too. The light is a bit bright, but that's easily fixed by turning it off.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Moliken

customer_reviews.title: Are you an electrician or handy with wiring?
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING to dislike about this toilet seat cover!!!!! I put it was easy to install, because Hubby is an Electrical Engineer, bonus!! He ran a wire from the existing outlet through the inside back of the vanity and installed a separate box on the side of vanity by the toilet for the receptacle. Turned out great!!!! You can have the light on ALL the time or not. Same with the 3 settings for the heated seat. It's so darn cool looking and guests rave about it!! We bought 2 of them and would love to give them as gifts??? Outstanding product :-)
customer_reviews.author: Angel22

customer_reviews.title: What a pleasure....
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spoil yourself or a love one this is the gift no one expects. It will be well received. The seat is well made, simple to install and very easy to operate. We leave the heat on all night and turn it off when we go to work. You'll get the full enjoyment of this seat when you need to make a bathroom call in the middle of the night. No more cold shock to wake you up all the way. You will wonder why you didn't get one sooner. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cushy tushy!
customer_reviews.text: Life's little luxury! I'll never go back! Who would have thought that a heated toilet seat could become a must have? Everyone who tries it or hears me talk about it wants one. We now have 3 in our house and all were super easy to install...like less than 10 minutes. Had to use a heavy duty short extension cord, but just tucked it along the vanity with some adhesive and it's out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lando

customer_reviews.title: The seat is even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The seat is even better than I expected. I have an old style toilet (flushometer) that doesn't have a water tank so I was happy to see that the seat fit perfectly.I t is sleek, modern and sturdier than I thought it would be. It's easy to attach and to clean. The low setting keeps the seat perfectly warm and the light (which can be switched off) allows for finding one's way without turning on another light. I'm delighted with the product and think it it's a reasonably priced item.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ro

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and pampering
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it - the adjustable heat level, the soft closing lid. It feels very pampering and luxurious. Only inconvenience is not being able to clean with disinfecting wipes when cleaning the rest of the toilet, but understand that it could damage the material. Will be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Buns
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I got it for my GF, because she dislikes the cold winter toilet and all of the frosty joy it brings. I have to say, I like it too. On low, it's warm enough for me. On high, you could probably cook an egg. The added LED light is a nice feature, especially late at night when preserving night visions and going back to sleep is appreciated. The wall plug and cord are generous, but you do need to be near a power outlet. I recommend plugging it into a GFCI outlet for safety, since it is being used in a wet environment.
customer_reviews.author: DrStTee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my mom one of these 2 years ago for Christmas, and I love stopping at her house to go to the bathroom!!! I know, weird right? She lives in an old house with the toilet right next to a window and it was always cold so she loves it too. So this year she is buying me one for my house ( probably so I'll quit stopping at her house just to pee!) I moved into an old house one block from her and now I can't wait to get my own!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamperedkay

customer_reviews.title: LED is a bit bright and harsh, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: The warmer works great and the soft hinge is a nice touch, no more slamming the seat down. But the LED is too bright. Definitely uncomfortable to look at in the middle of the night. I added a 10K resistor in series to knock it down, now it's a perfect nightlight and not a Bellagio fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: It is an average product
customer_reviews.text: This seat is smaller than my round toilet. It does not fit well and a little difficult to secure so when u sit on it- it moves but it does stay warm and I love the blue night light. The cord is short so if you do not have an outlet near you will need an extension cord
customer_reviews.author: rochele heflin-wiley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I didn’t want to hear my mother anymore about how cold my bathroom was every time she visited. Now I’m even glad I bought it. The only thing is that I have to keep putting it back into place every so often but that’s nothing to really complain about. So far I’ve had it for a few months and it has been working perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CAN

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Lumawarm. The first was installed on a different style toilet and we liked it so much that when we had our new house built, we had to have a new one. Our new toilets are elongated vs the non-enongated previous ones. In fact, at my new house, I had every toilet room wired for a seat heater just in case. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this seat for our very cold Colorado winter climate. This is a quality product and we were so happy to receive it....the bummer for us is that it isn't going to work with the bathroom arrangement in our current home. The plug in part of the seat is too difficult to make work for us. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to anyone with the right set-up. It would be most helpful if there were close plugins. We just weren't going to be happy with extension cords running around our small space. Oh, so nice to enjoy the warm tushy part, though!!
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My son installed it over a bidet attachment we had. Went on fine. It is so nice to have a nice warm toilet seat in the cold Michigan winters.!! Not sure about sturdiness yet because we've only had it a couple of weeks. Hope it holds up as I am used to it now.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Wife and daughters agree... every toilet needs to warm your buns,.,.,
customer_reviews.text: If you buy one for your home, be prepared to buy more... Wife and daughters insist every toilet in the home needs to be warm now. Adding a discreet GFCI power outlet near your toilet base takes a little effort, but it's not a big deal for a homeowner that can do basic outlet wiring. If you are building a new home, I'd recommend that every toilet have a discreet GFCI outlet nearby. High tech bathrooms are only going to improve upon this technology...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Powell

customer_reviews.title: Almost too warm
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice to have a warm toilet seat on a chilly day, but we've found that even on the lowest setting it's too warm if you are there for more than 10-15 seconds (which is completely unrealistic). I'm not a fan of the blue light but the roommate likes it. The thing I don't like is how small the seat "hole" (the open part to the toilet bowl, through which deposits are made). The opening is a couple inches smaller than a traditional toilet seat and if you're not paying attention you could have spillover onto the back of the seat (ick). Beyond these inconveniences, it was easy to install and is serving it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: OMG, the best thing on the planet! My son's bathroom toilet seat was always cool in the Michigan Winters due to the tile floors. Installed the Brondell LumaWarm heated seat without any issues and it is amazing. The seat is perfectly warm and I especially like how the seat and lid automatically lower. I actually prefer using his restroom now instead of going upstairs to use my own. If you are considering making this purchase, just do it. You won't regret it. The cord is a little short as stated in other reviews but easily corrected via adding an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: WOW !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the cold natured wife and WOW !!!!! Now instead of a some what scream every time, I get a big OOOOOO!! Didn't think it was possible for a woman to like a toilet seat more than diamonds. She brags to EVERYONE about the best Christmas present ever. I kinda like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Hot buns!
customer_reviews.text: It’s warm instead of cold when you sit on it, in the winter, in the middle of the night or first thing when you wake! (Obviously it’s on the whole day but these times are so nice to get hot buns!) So much silly pleasure from such a small thing.
customer_reviews.author: sarahssweets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: How does the human race live without one of these!.... I chose the more expensive one of this product due to reviews and that I wanted it to last much longer. I have only had this for about 3 weeks, but absolutely love it. I love all the features. It is very well made and is of very good quality. In looking at the cheaper ones I noticed much mention of discolor (that telling me the product was made of some type of memory foam). This product is the same material as that of one bought at a home improvement store, so I'm counting on it to last and keep its color.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: enjoy this comfort luxury.
customer_reviews.text: this seat replaced our previous version, and this is much better due to the setting availability. We don't use the seat light, since we tend to leave the light on. A heated seat is something I never want to be without. To me, it makes such a difference, especially in the winter, but much of the year in New England. Recommend. I doubt you'll regret it.
customer_reviews.author: myfriendbarley

customer_reviews.title: Pampered butt
customer_reviews.text: Don't ever try a heated toilet seat. Please don't. If you do, you will have to have one for the rest of your life! It's awesome. This is my second one from the same company. I moved out of my old house into a new house with no outlets in the bathroom so I didn't take it with me. A few months later? I've gotten a replacement and have had someone come out and wire for me.
customer_reviews.author: ginger9077

customer_reviews.title: Happiest tushy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even sit on another toilet seat now without thinking of my amazing heated toilet seat. As a woman, I sit a lot to use the toilet and it’s always a shock to sit down on a freezing cold seat. This setup is really a dream. I love how there is 3 heat settings and even a night light. It’s really easy to clean and feels study. The only challenge was the power cord which was extremely short so my husband plugged it into an extension so that it could fit closest to the outlet. Get one, you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather-Rae

customer_reviews.title: Funky
customer_reviews.text: As expected, it provides warm seats, specially on winter. Though it is a little difficult to tighten the plastic screws, and cost is a little stiff. It eliminates the use of nightlight in the bathroom as it emits blue glows.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lockman

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I wish every bathroom in the world had these heated toilet seats. What a wonderful experience it is. I have an overactive bladder along with IBS so I spend lots of time on the throne. It is nice to find easily the toilet in the middle of the night with its lovely blue light. This is a luxury item that is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Flower1

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second one of these as the first one stopped working after 3 years. Heats really well, and the nightlight is handy. My wife loves this thing, so it was a no brainer to replace it with the same one once this one conked out. Really nice when you wake up in the middle of a cold winters night and need to go - comforting to not be shocked with a cold seat when you sit down... Does start to yellow a bit if left on for too long a period of time, but overall a good investment with great results - I now know that I just expect to replace them every 3 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Koenig

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t written a review of anything I have ever purchased on Amazon. and I am a loyal customer, but I have to take the time and review this awesome item! I bought one for my bathroom. It just took my husband a couple of minutes to install it. It is heavenly! My husband was a little skeptical, but he thought it was great,too. The next day I ordered two more for our other toilets. Wow! You can’t imagine the difference. We keep them on “low”. Used a power strip for each one . Cord is pretty short. A total luxury. For a hundred bucks, you will love it,
customer_reviews.author: Dear Raaby

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but a good buy that will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good heated toilet seat, but the temp for the seat looses its strength over time. We started on medium heat and it was perfect, but after about a month the medium heat lost its intensity. It was still warm, but not as much as it was originally. We have switched to high now and it is doing well, but also has lost some intensity over time. The soft close works well and the cord has a good length. It took me 10 minutes to remove old seat and install this one. Very easy to install. It is a good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lisath

customer_reviews.title: Midwestern winter must have!
customer_reviews.text: I laughed at one review before I bought this that said it would "change your life"! I have to say, I'm a believer now! I used the downstairs toilet (not heated) after having this one for a week and almost let out a squeal! You may laugh too, but I'm telling you, it makes winter a lot more bearable! Even my son, who was embarrassed when he knew his friends would see it when they came over, admitted at the end of the night several of those teenagers said it surprised them, but it was "kinda nice". Try it before you criticize it!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Stoub

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. These are wonderful, especially if your husband keeps the house temperature set at "Refrigerator." I even installed it myself -- very simple to do. Don't remember life before I had them -- oh wait, yes I do -- jolted in the middle of the night to use the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Biker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and amazing on the bum
customer_reviews.text: First 24 hours and oh my it's amazing lol. How did I go this long without a heated seat? It took about 2 min to install and my bum has never been happier. You will sit on it even when you don't have to pee, it feels that nice.
customer_reviews.author: ursula h

customer_reviews.title: Great WARM toilet seat.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little heated seat. My gosh, this is so nice. The only change I would make is to be able to dim the light. It can be pretty bright at night. I need to get another one, for my other bathroom. I hate using the other toilet because I just cringe when I have to use the old regular COLD seat. Very easy to install and the slow closer is great too.
customer_reviews.author: RazorJim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best purchase I've made in years! I'm an amputee and sitting on a cold toilet seat can be torture for the nerves. I ended up buying one for home and for work. Everyone else loves it now also.
customer_reviews.author: Cassiusgma

customer_reviews.title: The nite lite does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he complained about a cold toilet seat. I like the idea of the nite lite in it. However, the nite lite does not work in the one I gave him. I bought it a few months before his birthday, so I could not return it. Also, the seat does not stay up when needed. The heat feels good!!!, so there is a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Customer service as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: I like it... my wife LOVES IT! The unit totally died right at warranty end. Customer sedrvice was amazingly responsive - both email and phone. They needed a copy of the receipt and immediately sent a replacement. I asked how these units are holding up and representative said this exact unit never fails. I am purchasing two more.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Quiet closing function is useful, we do not use electric part.
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a replacement slow close lid in our guest bathroom. The electric cord can be cut off, since we do not have power available nearby. Husband loves this feature so midnight runs to the toilet do not disturb the peace.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Such a luxury...it is a GREAT christmas present!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install (assuming you have an outlet near your toilet!!!) and I just love the warmth. We heat with wood so warm is a precious thing! I have bought 3 of them - but they are just being installed today as I did NOT have outlets near my toilets so I hired an electrician to install those. Hopefully they are durable but time will tell... Brondell L60-RW LumaWarm Heated Nightlight Round Toilet Seat, White
customer_reviews.author: Linda B Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get this years ago?
customer_reviews.text: Installation was so easy and no tools needed. It took about a minute to get warm and soft close lid and seat are very nice. It is very easy to use and I'd recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: June W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my seat! I've had this for a year and a half and it hasn't disappointed me. I hate going potty anywhere else bc its shocking how cold other toliet seats are. I wish I had a portable battery powered one. Lol. This is so comfortable and warm. Never too hot. And the light is nice at night so you don't have to shock yourself with a bright light and a cold seat!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to install new seat. Look about 3 minutes to take out the old seat and put in the new seat. The heated seat is great. My mother is almost 90 years old and loves sitting on a warm seat. New England weather is cold so there is nothing like a hot seat. Buttons to control light and heat easy to use. Night light is and added bonus. No need to turn on light in middle of night. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dufresne

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality heated lid
customer_reviews.text: awesome quality heated lid. put mine in a satellite bathroom. Round lit fits perfect. heated toilet at the fishing camp. the ladies will love you on the cold nights. 3 awesome settings. another review from shields trout camp.
customer_reviews.author: Trout Man

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I have neuropathy and sitting on a cold toilet exacerbates this. My comfort level has improved and I would not want to go without. Even my husband who was very skeptical about this purchase is a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Deschamps

customer_reviews.title: Love not sitting on a warm seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the toilet set is warm! No more anticipating that the seat will be cold and uncomfortable. My husband loves the light and that it "directs" his stream. Both the light and seat can be turned off when needed and there are 2 controls for the heated seat. Wish I'd bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Slaton

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you have an electric outlet near your toilet.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. if you have a bathroom like mine, that is always ice cold, you will like this. I spent 40 years bracing myself before I sat on that freezing cold toilet seat. This is just about as good, as the idea of hot running water.
customer_reviews.author: kindle customer.

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd be so excited, but...
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat is AMAZING! It is perfect for Michigan's Upper Peninsula winters! We keep it on low, and it is the perfect amount of warmth to not get that cold jolt that awakens you fully when you need to use the bathroom in the middle of the night. Easy to install, easy to maintain. I just wish you could choose which side the cord is on, right or left - ours was on the left, which is the opposite side of the toilet from our outlet.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganFinn

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms up
customer_reviews.text: This is the second seat on this toilet. Heating element went out after about 5 years. My wife has a pampered bottom. All her friends love it. Was glad they did away with built in fan and added nite lite.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: a warm tush beats the winter slush
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, looks good and arrived fast. Don't know if the entire rim is supposed to warm up or just parts (like the one I bought does)...haven't put it to the warmest setting yet so perhaps the higher the heat setting the more of it heats? We'll see. The led light is nice and bright...even with the lid down it still gives enough light that I don't need my night light on anymore. Also like the soft closing feature on both the rim and the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Steve

customer_reviews.title: Creature comfort at its best!
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice! We do not normally keep our bathroom heated much, and this is such a nice treat to have a warm seat. The blue light provides a nice night light for the bathroom as well. Update: Hubby originally did not want this, but now he likes it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Gina marcell

product_meta.title: Brondell L60-RW LumaWarm Heated Nightlight Round Toilet Seat, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:RoundIt's an unexpected essential for anyone who's been frozen by a cold toilet seat or stubbed their toes on the way to the bathroom at midnight.The LumaWarm Heated Nightlight Toilet Seat from Brondell is a premium toilet seat that offers the comfort of a heated seat, the convenience of a toilet bowl light, and the quiet closing of a slam-free seat and lid. With four temperature settings, the LumaWarm is comfortable all year round and it's simple to install in place of your existing seat. This luxurious toilet seat delivers warmth, light, and quiet to your bathroom. Electrical Power Required The LumaWarm is powered by a standard GFI wall outlet. Electrical Power Required The LumaWarm is powered by a standard GFI wall outlet.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The LumaWarm heated nightlight toilet seat offers the luxury and comfort of a heated seat with the added convenience of a soothing illuminating LED nightlight. There's nothing more jarring than turning on the bathroom light in the middle of the night and sitting down on a freezing cold toilet seat. With the LumaWarm, you will be guided by the soft illuminating glow of the blue nightlight and comforted by the soothing heated seat, set to your personal temperature preference. With 4 temperature setting options off-low-med-high, the LumaWarm is comfortable all year round. The elegant built in nightlight has a simple "on/off" button and LED light bulb that is energy efficient and long lasting. The LumaWarm heated nightlight toilet seat quickly and easily replaces any existing toilet seat and is adjustable for a perfect fit on any standard fixture. As with all Brondell toilet seats, the LumaWarm has a gentle closing seat and lid with superior style and quality you won't find anywhere else. The LumaWarm heated nightlight toilet seat is a must-have for every bathroom. Don't lose anymore sleep, get the LumaWarm today and start living in luxury and comfort.
feature_bullets: WARM AND WELCOMING: Say goodbye to the shock of a cold toilet seat and say hello to a warm, welcoming seat. Four seat heat settings make the LumaWarm comfortable all year round.
ILLUMINATING NIGHTLIGHT: A cool blue nightlight illuminates your toilet bowl, lighting your way during your midnight trip to the ‘loo.

SLOW CLOSE AND MORE: Gentle closing seat and lid, ergonomic seat, intuitive controls, available in both Elongated and Round sizes, and available in White or Biscuit color. This listing is for Round, White – toilet seat measures 18.5” x 14.3” x 2.8”
EASY INSTALLATION: the LumaWarm installs easily on your existing toilet, simply remove your toilet seat and replace it with the LumaWarm - no plumber or tools required.
WE ARE BRONDELL: Born and raised in San Francisco, CA Brondell makes healthy home products created from the highest quality components and crafted for excellence.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,619 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
